In England, in the seven days to 20 April, there were 128,533 new confirmed cases (227.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 April, there were 190,721 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 33% (62,188 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 April is 18,489,342 (32,695.5 cases per 100,000 population).
